room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Fun, challenging and friendly. I def recommend for groups or even families with teenagers, my teen sons loved it and were very good at it.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Took my daughter and her girlfriends for a birthday celebration event. They did the Museum Heist and had a blast! Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: This was a blast! Have always been hearing about these but never checked one out until now. The eight of us chose the Museum Heist. Each of us contributed to eventually escaping with 6 minutes to spare. Loved the direction from our host - helpful but subtle. Heard great things about the Kidnapping scenario and will be back to check it out sometime!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Went with friends to the Museum Heist Escape Room. While it was somewhat difficult, we had a great time! Staff was very nice. We would definitely do this again!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: We had a blast, we did the Heist room. It took a little while to get the hang of it, but when we did it was so much fun trying to figure the clues out. We can't wait to go back and do the Kidnapping room. Thanks for a fun time Breakout!
